price: "Allahove vjere se držite! Zar ima ljepše vjere od Allahove?! Mi samo Njega obožavamo."
arabic: صِبۡغَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ صِبۡغَةٗۖ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ṣib'ghata al-lahi waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ṣib'ghatan wanaḥnu lahu ʿābidūna
